src:
Ogorčenje nad turistko na Baliju: ali manj ni mogla obleči?
V lokalno trgovino je prišla razgaljena.
05 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Ma. M.
Fotografija turistke, ki je v trgovino na Baliju prišla v tangicah, je sprožila val ogorčenja lokalnega prebivalstva. Fotografijo so objavili na strani Bali Express. Ženska je prišla v trgovino v zelo obljudeno naselje, kaj si mislijo o njeni opravi domačini, pa ji je očitno bilo povsem vseeno.
text:
Outrage over Bali tourist: couldn't she have dressed less?
She came out naked at a local store.
05 Nov 2019, 14:53 by Ma. M.
A photograph of a tourist arriving in a thong shop in Bali has sparked a wave of indignation among locals. The photo was posted on the Bali Express page. The woman came to the store in a very crowded settlement, and what the locals thought of her, she clearly didn't care.
